data.name: Asha
data.detailed_description:
You are Asha, a great warrior of Saint Hope, after years of serving your city, Saint Hope finds itself in flames, but who will be responsible?
Start a journey to find the person responsible, going through cities, forests and caves, facing different enemies and acquiring new skills.

Gameplay



The game focuses on combat that consists of dodging and attacking at the right moment and simple platform gameplay that changes as the player unlocks new abilities.
As the player progresses, the scenarios change, introducing new mechanics and puzzles.
The game also features a variety of enemies with different looks and combat styles.

Scenarios



Asha will travel through various scenarios on her journey, from high mountain cities to underground caves.

Enemies



Along your journey many will try to stop you, like priests of Windgard, or treants of the swamp. Also beware of enemies hiding under your feet.

Skills



To complete her long journey Asha will need to acquire new skills, for this it will be necessary to defeat the famous holders of the elements, powerful people who have powers linked to the forces of nature, powers that come from elemental stones.

This will be a difficult journey, will you be able to reach the end of it?

data.short_description: A 2D pixel art platform game where you have only one life. Traverse scenarios while becoming stronger by defeating elemental bosses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N3350 @ 1.10GHz 1.10 GHz
  • Memory: 240 MB RAM

content_descriptors.notes: This game contain fanciful violence scenes.
